content: > **subscribe to my newsletter and get an exclusive 50% off coupon code for your first purchase > subscribe here 4 ** > this pattern is part of the friends > with granny blanket crochet along 1 > you can find the complete 16 squares > pdf bundle ** here 2 ** iris stitch is another one of my favorite stitches it has a flower-like look it creates a holey fabric and still has more of a modern look it s also a great stitch to use in blankets or as a border **you can find the free video tutorial here 3 ** the stitch consists of double_crochet s and chain and that s why it also works up really fast which is a bonus - skill level - easy requires some experience - the pattern is written using english u s terminology - the pattern is made with dk yarn - 100% cotton and a 4 0 mm crochet hook - finished size- 7 5×7 5 19×19 cm if you have any questions regarding the pattern feel free to contact me copyright © 2020 gootie agat rottman-cassel all rights reserved the pattern and photos in this pattern are property of gootie designs you can sell the finished product on a small scale if you write about this product online please give credit to the original pattern please note that there is only a certain amount of variations possible when one crochets and any similarities to other patterns are purely coincidental to the best of my knowledge this pattern is my original unique design return/refund policy due to the fact that it is impossible to return a digital file all sales are final 1 https //madebygootie--eclairemakery thrivecart com/granny-square-blanket/62eeeac61423b/ ref=ravelry 2 https //madebygootie--eclairemakery thrivecart com/granny-square-blanket/ ref=ravelry 3 https //youtu be/cclfekwcctw 4 https //madebygootie myflodesk com/ravelry-sign-up
